actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vulture makes one Beak attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Defensive Bile
reactions.desc: When a creature the vulture can see hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the vulture can spit partially digested carrion at the creature. The attacker must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or take 5 (2d4) acid damage and be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Carrion Sense
special_abilities.desc: The vulture can pinpoint, by scent, the location of carrion, dead creatures, and Undead without the Incorporeal Movement trait within 60 feet of it.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The vulture's Perception is 18 when perceiving by sight or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The vulture has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
